name: Just Solitaire: Klondike
description:
"Easy to use, fun to play. Love the game!!!"

"Every time I have a moment I jump to this game!"

"This is better than the ones u have to pay! Gotta love it!"

Play Klondike solitaire, the most popular solitaire game. Also called patience or just "solitaire." You can play by dragging or tapping. You can change the number of cards issued from the stock, and how many times you can turn the stock over. You can choose between different backgrounds, card designs, scoring methods and other options.
